spans.content: An example of a carefully synchronizing automaton
. One of its carefully synchronizing words is
a a ( b a ) ^ { \dot { 3 } } b b a b
We recall the result of Vorel [26] about the complexity of deciding whether
P S P A C E
is defined for all the states
wherever not mentioned otherwise. Having that we can go to the description of
Leta plain text be the word
and a privatekey to be any word
